name: SpaceWar (itch) (l3allil2on)
description:
This game was created to study programming and game design, In the game, I have fixed and added the system as follows:

MainMenu Scene

  1. Looping animated background 
  2. Change the color of the button 
  3. Increased the level 
  4. Added instructions 

Game Scene

  1. Added minimap
  2. Mission panel display
  3. Scene decoration
  4. Modify enemy ability
